thread.title: Fishnets Are Taking Over Fashion One Social Media Post At A Time
thread.title_full: Fishnets Are Taking Over Fashion One Social Media Post At A Time

author: Hrishitaa Sharma
title: Fishnets Are Taking Over Fashion One Social Media Post At A Time
text:
Hrishitaa Sharma Feb . 21 . 2017 Image Source: Instagram | @kyliejenner, @ozdencerrahogluu, @kimkardashian 
The sexiest trend since the naked dress has finally hit the fashion world â€“ Fishnet stockings. From off-duty models to runway showstoppers, stylists to bloggers â€“ everyone is going nuts about this trend. Here are couple of things that come to our mind when we analyse this trend. 1. Majorly spotted under denims, the fishnets were also spotted under sweatshirts at NYFW. Creatures of Comfort at NYFW AW17 | Image Source: voguerunway.com 2. Did the inception of this trend start from Kim Kardashian? A post shared by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Sep 28, 2016 at 2:31pm PDT 3. Or was it Kylie Jenner? ðŸŒŸ A post shared by Kylie (@kyliejenner) on Dec 1, 2016 at 10:59pm PST 4. Clearly, even Kendall can be the OG A post shared by Kendall (@kendalljenner) on Oct 17, 2016 at 7:44pm PDT 5. This trend is a staple under shorts Jun 4, 2016 at 10:03am PDT 6. Or under a bodysuit A post shared by badgalriri (@badgalriri) on Feb 2, 2017 at 8:54pm PST 7. And even ripped denims can get an upgrade with this trend! A post shared by @lowkeis on Feb 19, 2017 at 8:55am PST 
What are your thoughts? Do you love this black fishnet trend? 2
